Package bdd.entitiesManagers

Class Manager

  • java.lang.Object
    • bdd.entitiesManagers.Manager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BillManager, ClientManager, EmployerManager, OrderManager, ProductManager, StockManager, UserManager
    public class Manager
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains static methods for managing the connection to the database and input with the database
